dct_title_s: Soil map, Missouri, St. Louis County sheet
dct_description_sm: Color map showing the distribution of soils by colors and symbols. Other signs in the legend include: culture (cities, roads, bridges, railroads), relief (contours, hills, dunes, water lines), and drainage (rivers, lakes, swamps).

U.S. Dept. of Agriculture, Bureau of Soils in cooperation with the University of Missouri, Agricultural Experiment Station ; soils surveyed by H.H. Krusekopf of the University of Missouri, in charge, and D.B. Pratapas of the U.S. Department of Agriculture.
In lower left border: Base map in part from U.S. Geological Survey sheets.
"Topographic sheet used without alteration for City of St. Louis."
In lower right border: A. Hoen & Co., Baltimore, Md.
dct_creator_sm: University of Missouri--Columbia, Agricultural Experiment Station.
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Map Collections courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact Branner Earth Sciences Library & Map Collections at brannerlibrary@stanford.edu.
